description: The application does exactly what it's supposed to be doing.

Thank you Mr. Kann for developing this beautiful player. This is exactly what i have been searching for. However there seems to be one small problem with the playback but i think you can fix it very easy. The problem is that the next song in the playlist is not played automatically after the previous song ends. Both enabling and disabling of consume do not solve the issue. In order to play the next song i need to click the play button, click the next song button or click on the next song in the playlist. (Ubuntu 20.04.2 LTS) best wishes :-)
summary: Better than GMPC (Gnome Music Player Client)

description: Very beautiful player. Don't forget to sort the queue for the following song to begin playing automatically. best wishes
summary: I prefer it over GMPC (Gnome Music Player Client)
